parameters.name: AuthType
parameters.description:
The security authentication method of the API. Valid values:

*   **APP: Only authorized applications can call the API.**

*   **ANONYMOUS: The API can be anonymously called. In this mode, you must take note of the following rules:**

    *   All users who have obtained the API service information can call this API. API Gateway does not authenticate callers and cannot set user-specific throttling policies. If you make this API public, set API-specific throttling policies.

parameters.name: BackendName
parameters.description: The name of the backend service.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The OAS-compliant text file or OSS object URL.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group.

parameters.name: Overwrite
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to overwrite an existing API.

If an existing API has the same HTTP request type and backend request path as the API to be imported, the existing API is overwritten.

parameters.name: RequestMode
parameters.description:
The request mode. Valid values:

*   MAPPING: Parameters are mapped. Unknown parameters are filtered out.
*   PASSTHROUGH: Parameters are passed through.

parameters.name: SkipDryRun
parameters.description: Specifies whether to directly import the API without performing a precheck.
